title: India retailer Croma launching Apple-blessed store-in-a-store program
text:
India retailer Croma launching Apple-blessed store-in-a-store program 
Published By: MacNN.com - Today 
Apple has launched a pilot program in India, which will bring the store-in-a-store concept to consumer electronics chain Croma. The design i...
